subject: RE: Re: RE: Re: CABLE PROBLEME GT2
description_text:
The fault isn't visible from the outside, and to satisfy your request, I'll let you check that one of the wires is unsoldered. For this reason, it's not working. Thank you for your understanding. Sincerly, Envoyé depuis l'application Mail Orange ---------------- De : "service@simsonn.com" <service@simsonn.com> Envoyé : mercredi 06 août 2025 03:09 À : lodoroma@orange.fr Objet : Re: RE: Re: CABLE PROBLEME GT2 Hi Dominique CASTEL, I didn’t notice any obvious issues with this wire. Is it broken? Please provide a clear photo showing the break point so we can verify. On
 Tue, 5 Aug at 10:24 AM , Dominique CASTEL <lodoroma@orange.fr> wrote: Envoyé depuis l'application Mail Orange ---------------- De : "service@simsonn.com" <service@simsonn.com> Envoyé : mardi 05 août 2025 14:33 À : lodoroma@orange.fr Objet : Re: CABLE PROBLEME GT2 Hi Dominique CASTEL, What issue are you experiencing with the GT2 steering wheel cable? Please provide a photo, and we can arrange to send you a new one free of charge. On
 Tue, 5 Aug at 7:50 AM , Dominique CASTEL <lodoroma@orange.fr> wrote: Hello, I am a customer of yours and have a GT2 hub and Pro X pedals. I am very satisfied with my equipment, and I plan to get an H and sequential gearbox soon. However, I have a problem with the cable that connects my steering wheel to the PC. I can therefore no longer use my equipment. I would like you to inform me about the cable and give me a reference so that I can order quickly. I would like to point out that this request has already been made to you via WhatsApp, and I have not received a response. So please help me. Thank you. 2333:4206036

conversations.body_text: Hi Dominique CASTEL,  ​We need your order number, shipping address, phone number, and contact person information.

Thank you for your feedback. Please find the requested information below: ORDER NUMBER : 3046049663252939 (29/11/2024) SHIPPING ADRESS : Laurent CASTEL 14, route de la Cour de la Dathée 14380 NOUES DE SIENNE PHONE NUMBER : +33 6 70 95 30 73 CONTACT : Laurent CASTEL envoyé : 6 août 2025 à 15:51 de : "service@simsonn.com"
Aliexpress envoyé : 12 août 2025 à 05:37 de : General and sales enquiries
Hi Dominique CASTEL,  Could you please provide a screenshot of the order details page? It seems that the purchase was not made from our official store.
